12c (12.2.1.4.0)
E81453-01

Package oracle.adf.view.rich.component.rich

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    RichPopup.PopupContextCallback
    Marker interface applied to the ContextCallabck for invokeOnComponent.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    DynamicComponentFacesBean  
    DynamicComponentPropertyMap  
    PartialRichDocument
    The document component creates each of the standard root elements of an HTML page: <html>, <body>, and <head>, but by abstracting away from those components, can be used in non-HTML pages as well.
    PartialRichDynamicComponent
    The dynamicComponent is a component whose real type is defined by its attribute ComponentType.
    PartialRichMenu
    A menu is a vertical container for menu items.
    PartialRichMenuBar
    A menuBar is a single row container designed to hold menus, commandMenuItems, goMenuItems, and groups of these same components.
    PartialRichPopup
    The popup component is an invisible container control whose contents will be used in popup windows, such as context menus, note windows, dialogs and popup selectors.
    RichDialog
    The dialog control is a layout element that displays its children inside a dialog window and delivers DialogEvents when the OK, Yes, No and Cancel actions are activated.
    RichDocument  
    RichDynamicComponent
    RichDynamicComponent is a base class for dynamic component which supports different real type components.
    RichForm
    The UnifiedForm component creates an HTML <form> element.
    RichMenu  
    RichMenuBar  
    RichNoteWindow
    A note window is a layer that contains read-only information associated with a particular UI component.
    RichPanelWindow
    The af:panelWindow type of popup has identical features to the af:dialog except that it does not have the buttonBar facet or button type configurations.
    RichPoll
    The poll component delivers PollEvents to the server at fixed intervals.
    RichPopup
    Popup component.
    RichPopup.PopupHints
    Server-side representation of popup hints passed to the RichPopup's show method.
    RichQuery
    The query component provides the user the ability to perform a query based on a saved search or personalize saved searches.
    RichQuickQuery
    The QuickQuery component enables a user to perform a quick search for a textual string against the selected criterion belonging to the QueryDescriptor as specified by the value property.
    RichSubform
    The RichSubform represents an independently submittable region of a page.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    RichMenu.MenuType  
    RichMenu.RootContainer
    There are three menu root container values: NONE - we are not currently in a menu root container MENU_BAR - we are are currently rooted in a menuBar MENU_POPUP - we are currently rooted in a menu popup
    RichPopup.PopupHints.AlignTypes
    Represents the primary hint of how the client-side position manager will will attempt to align a popup to an element.
    RichPopup.PopupHints.HintTypes
    Key identifier that defines a characteristic about how a popup should be shown.
